name: A spirit
description:
"A spirit" is a colour matching game, where you play as a spirit (the positive one) to defend yourself from negative objects by controlling the shields.

How to play:

      PC:---         use arrow keys or A &D to rotate the shield.

    Android --- tap on the right side of the screen to rotate clockwise and on the left side to rotate anticlockwise.

The game has  journey mode and endless mode

     The journey mode has 15 stages each stage has a different enemy pattern style

    In endless mode, enemy patterns are random from those 15 patterns.

From time to time during the game power-ups will be available. The player can use them and survive longer. there are 7 power-ups available in the game.

Do share your feedback about the game in the comments. Helps me improve myself.
